vision.notes: Sensory capabilities of Fecampiidae flatworms are not detailed in the provided context. Vision may be present, absent, or modified.

chemoreception.notes: Inferred to be present as a common sensory modality in flatworms for navigation and food detection. Precise mechanisms unknown.

mechanoreception.notes: Inferred to be present as a common sensory modality in flatworms for detecting substrate and water currents. Precise mechanisms unknown.
